verses.verse: The <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>as<s%> a <S%G3141>witness,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he might <S%G3140>testify<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G5457>light,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> might <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>
He <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1565>the<s%> <S%G5457>light,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> was sent <S%G1565>that<s%> he might <S%G3140>testify<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G5457>light.<s%>
He <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> his <S%G2398>own,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> those who were his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G3880>receive<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3745>as<s%> many <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1325>he<s%> gave the <S%G1849>right<s%> to <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G5043>children,<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4100>believe<s%> in <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name:<s%>

<S%G3739>who<s%> were <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G129>blood,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G435>man,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G3056>Word<s%> became <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4637>lived<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G2254>us.<s%> <S%G2532>We<s%> <S%G2300>saw<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1391>glory,<s%> such <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> the one and only <S%G3439>Son<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> the <S%G3439>Father,<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> of <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G225>truth.<s%>

<S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3140>testified<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2896>cried<s%> <S%G3004>out,<s%> saying, <S%G3778>"This<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> he of <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3588><s%> 'He who <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G3450>me<s%> <S%G1715>has<s%> <S%G1096>surpassed<s%> <S%G3450>me,<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G3450>me.<s%>'"

No <S%G3762>one<s%> has <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> at any <S%G4455>time.<s%> The <S%G3439>one<s%> and only <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G2859>bosom<s%> of the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G1565>he<s%> has declared <S%G1834>him.<s%>

<S%G2036>They<s%> said <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G5101>"Who<s%> are <S%G1488>you?<s%> <S%G1325>Give<s%> us an <S%G612>answer<s%> to take <S%G1325>back<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G2248>us.<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> do <S%G3004>you<s%> say <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G4572>yourself?<s%>"

He <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G1473>"I<s%> am the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of one <S%G994>crying<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> <S%G2116><s%> 'Make straight the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%>' <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G2036>said.<s%>"

The next <S%G1887>day,<s%> <S%G2491>he<s%> <S%G991>saw<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G1492>"Behold,<s%> the <S%G286>Lamb<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> takes <S%G142>away<s%> the <S%G266>sin<s%> of the <S%G2889>world!<s%>

<S%G2504>I<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2443>for<s%> this <S%G1223%G99999>reason<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G907>baptizing<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5124>water:<s%> that he would be <S%G5319>revealed<s%> to <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>"

<S%G2504>I<s%> <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G1492>recognize<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> who <S%G3992>sent<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> to <S%G907>baptize<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5204>water,<s%> <S%G1565>he<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G1909><s%> 'On <S%G3739>whomever<s%> you will <S%G1492>see<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2597>descending,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3306>remaining<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> the <S%G3778>same<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> who <S%G907>baptizes<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G302>Spirit.<s%>'
<S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G1689>looked<s%> at <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> as he <S%G4043>walked,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G1492>"Behold,<s%> the <S%G286>Lamb<s%> of <S%G2316>God!<s%>"

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4762>turned,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2300>saw<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G190>following,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> are you <S%G2212>looking<s%> <S%G1161>for?<s%>" They <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G4461>"Rabbi<s%>" <S%G3739>(which<s%> is to <S%G3004>say,<s%> being <S%G2059>interpreted,<s%> <S%G1320>Teacher<s%>), <S%G4226>"where<s%> are you <S%G3306>staying?<s%>"

He <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2064>"Come,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>see.<s%>" They <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G4225>where<s%> he was <S%G3306>staying,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G3306>stayed<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%> <S%G1161>It<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G5613>about<s%> the <S%G1182>tenth<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G71>brought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1689><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1689>looked<s%> at <S%G846>him,<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G4771>"You<s%> <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G2495>Jonah.<s%> <S%G4771>You<s%> shall be <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G2786>Cephas<s%>" <S%G3739>(which<s%> is by <S%G2059>interpretation,<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%>).

On the next <S%G1887>day,<s%> <S%G2424>he<s%> was <S%G2309>determined<s%> to go <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G5376>Philip.<s%> <S%G2532>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G190>"Follow<s%> <S%G3427>me.<s%>"

<S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3482>Nathanael,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> "We have <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3739>him,<s%> of whom <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> <S%G1125>wrote:<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3478>Nazareth,<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G2501>Joseph.<s%>"

<S%G3482>Nathanael<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G4159>"How<s%> do <S%G1097>you<s%> know <S%G3165>me?<s%>" <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G4253>"Before<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G5455>called<s%> <S%G4571>you,<s%> when you <S%G5607>were<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> the fig <S%G4808>tree,<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G4571>you.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3754>"Because<s%> I <S%G2036>told<s%> <S%G4671>you,<s%> <S%G1492><s%> 'I saw <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G5270>underneath<s%> the fig <S%G4808>tree,<s%>' do <S%G4100>you<s%> <S%G3700>believe?<s%> You will see greater things <S%G3173>than<s%> <S%G5130>these!<s%>"

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G281>"Most<s%> <S%G281>certainly,<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G575>hereafter<s%> you will <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G455>opened,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G305>ascending<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2597>descending<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G737>Man.<s%>"
